-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Toolkit for Koshucode
--   
--   Toolkit for handling koshucode data. This package contains executables
--   except for <tt>koshu</tt> command. Please check package
--   <tt>koshucode-baala-processor</tt> for <tt>koshu</tt> command.
@package koshucode-baala-toolkit
@version 0.19.0.0


-- | Koshucode syntactic tool.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuSyntax

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-syntax</tt> command.
koshuSyntaxMain :: IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
instance Ord Option
instance Enum Option
instance Bounded Option


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode conversion
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF

-- | Convert RDF graph to list of judges.
judgesFromRdf :: (RDF g, StringValue v) => RDFTupleType -> g -> [Judge v]

-- | Convert RDF triple to affirmed judge.
judgeFromTriple :: StringValue v => RDFTupleType -> Triple -> Judge v

-- | Type of conversion
data RDFTupleType

-- | Binary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject and <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple2 :: RDFTupleType

-- | Ternary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject, <tt>/p</tt> predicate, and
--   <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple3 :: RDFTupleType
instance Show RDFTupleType
instance Eq RDFTupleType
instance Ord RDFTupleType
instance Enum RDFTupleType
instance Bounded RDFTupleType


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode converter.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdfMain
koshuRdfMain :: IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
instance Ord Option
instance Enum Option
instance Bounded Option


-- | Koshucode syntactic tool.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuChange

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu-change</tt> command.
koshuChangeMain :: IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
instance Ord Option
instance Enum Option
instance Bounded Option
instance Show Input
instance Eq Input
